headline: Assessing Kenvue (KVUE) Valuation As Recent Share Momentum Contrasts With Longer Term Returns
summary: Why Kenvue is on investors’ radar today Kenvue (KVUE) is drawing attention after its recent share performance, with the stock showing mixed short term moves but a stronger past 3 months. This has prompted fresh questions around how investors might view its valuation. See our latest analysis for Kenvue. At a share price of $17.40, Kenvue’s recent 1 day share price return of 1.16% and 90 day share price return of 21.09% contrast with a 1 year total shareholder return decline of 14.89%,...
